greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers n such that 2^n does not contain the digit 6 (probably finite).
program: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..1000] | not 6 in Intseq(2^n) ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 07 2015
xref: Cf. similar sequences listed in A035064.
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1998
